about: Feel free to send me your discovered bugs, suggestions and in-game plats!
help: Hello stranger, I'm Sirken. I give respawn times. If you use me we can do great things together!
These are commands you can type to interact with me. Remember! I recognize only commands that start with !
To get a specific command help, please type !help command
[!tod]          - Update the tod of a Merb
[!pop]          - Update the pop of a Merb
[!watch]        - Keep an eye on your merbs
[!merbs]        - List name, aliases and tags of Merbs
get: Get info about one or more merbs
{all}       - print merbs with a valid eta
{tag}       - print merbs according to the provided tag
{info}      - show more details about a single merb
{timezone}  - show times in your timezone (GMT, CET, PST, EST)
.Examples: [!get all] :: [!get Scout] :: [!get info Lord Bob pst] :: [!get triplets] :: [!get KdT info est]
tod: ToD aka Time of Death will be used to calculate the ETA of the specified merb
{Merb Name}  - mandatory. merb full name or one of its alias - !merbs to list them
{Time}       - mandatory. can be {hh:mm} or {now} or {xx minutes ago}
{Date}       - optional. Use the format {yyyy-mm-dd}. If no date is passed, today is used
{approx}     - optional. If not sure about the exact time consider adding this parameter
{timezone}   - optional. use a different timezone from cet when {hh:mm} time is used {cet|gmt|est|edt|cst|cdt|pst|pdt}
.Examples: [!tod Lucan now approx] :: [!tod Scout Charisa 9mins ago] :: [!tod scout 12:34 approx pst]
[!tod Vulak 69 minutes ago ] :: [!tod Lord Bob 2019-02-25 15:00 est approx]
pop: Pop date/time is used to calculate ETA only if its newer than ToD
{Merb Name}  - mandatory. merb full name or one of its alias - !merbs to list them
{Time}       - mandatory. can be {hh:mm} or {now} or {xx minutes ago}
{Date}       - optional. Use the format {yyyy-mm-dd}. If no date is passed, today is used
{approx}     - optional. If not sure about the exact time consider adding this parameter
{timezone}   - optional. use a different timezone from cet when {hh:mm} time is used {cet|gmt|est|edt|cst|cdt|pst|pdt}
.Examples: [!pop Lucan now approx] :: [!pop Scout Charisa 9mins ago] :: [!pop scout 12:34 approx pst]
[!pop Vulak 69 minutes ago ] :: [!pop Lord Bob 2019-02-25 15:00 est approx]
earthquake: Earthquake! This powerful command will reset all pop times and will alert all people watching 1 merb at least
Use once, go to kill all dragons you can and update ToDs when you are back
{Time}      - mandatory. can be {hh:mm} or {now} or {xx minutes ago}
{Date}      - optional. Use the format {yyyy-mm-dd}. If no date is passed, today is used
{timezone}  - optional. use a different timezone from cet when {hh:mm} time is used {cet|gmt|est|edt|cst|cdt|pst|pdt}
watch: When you watch a merb you will be alerted xx minutes before the ETA
To see a list of watched merbs type !watch without any parameter
{Minutes}     - optional specify how many minutes you want to be alerted before ETA (30minutes default)
{off}         - optional. if no merb is specified all alarms will be switched off
.Examples: [!watch scout] :: [!watch lord bob 60] :: [!watch statue off] :: [!watch off]
